Giant Pursuers Teleport Device:
This is a Teleport Device installed by the Giant Pursuers to teleport into the Giant's Cave.
To use it, you need some special qualifications. The necessary qualifications, and the available teleport destinations, are as follow.

Qualification - Giant Pursuers faction level 2 and above Location - Upper level of the Giant's Cave, Kamael's Stronghold,entrance to the Giants' Room of Relics
